Hi,

I am a new Cantera user, interested in doing chemical equilibrium 
cal=
culations for diesel combustion analysis. I have installed the 
MATLAB tool=
s and everything is working fine. I have read the tutorials, 
and still is =
not clear to me how to obtain the derivatives of the 
thermodynamic propert=
ies of the gas mixture. In particular, I am 
interested in calculating the =
derivatives respect to pressure and 
temperature of the internal energies: =
du/dp, du/dT. Is this doable in 
Cantera? Thank you very much for your kind=
 attention.

Best Regards,
Peter
